resources.string: Loading all of the fun stuff...
Looks like we couldn\'t retrieve any data.
Couldn\'t refresh the data\nTry again later.
It looks like there isn\'t any data right now.\nPull down down to refresh.
Such empty!\nCheck out this year\'s sessions and add a few to your schedule.

Thanks for downloading this app, and I hope you've found it useful!

Find a bug or think of a cool new feature? Create an issue on Github or email me at james.kirkbride@gmail.com.

Pull requests are also welcome!
